message: What does everyone think? Any feedback for us?
The framework is modelled after Django, so yeah, a little different from Ruby ones.
Do you see yourselves specializing in web-based IDE's or easy cloud deployment?
pretty cool. coming from ruby, the framework takes a bit getting used too.
We want to focus on the platform, in particular the idea that modules can be much more tightly integrated: http://blog.akshell.com/akshell-0.3/#disqus_thread
